subject: Quikscript for German?
msgSnippet: Hi, I m new to this group and not totally informed of everything that has been delt with here. Does anyone know of an adaptation of Quikscript to the German
messageBody:
Hi,

I'm new to this group and not totally informed of everything that has
been delt with here.
Does anyone know of an adaptation of Quikscript to the German
language? On the whole, Quikscript works quite well for German.
However, we have those umlaut letters (äöü) in short and long
pronunciation. Any ideas?

Greetings,
Hermann
